subtitleNullable: Dataset includes description of top 2000 games and 1M ratings from 1630 geeks
descriptionNullable:
Dataset includes descriptions of the top 2,000 games according to boardgamegeek.com as of February 2023, as well as over 1M ratings from over 1,500 geeks (users).

Ideal for creating recommendation systems and analyzing user preferences as each user has more than 470 game ratings.

**====================**
**===== Board Games =====**
**====================**

boardgame_id - board game id
title - title of board game
year_published - year of publication of the board game
minplayers - minimum number of players per game
maxplayers - maximum number of players per game
minplaytime - minimum playing time per game
maxplaytime - maximum playing time per game
age - lower age limit for playing
users_rated - number of users who rated a game
average_rating - average rating
bayes_average_rating - bayes average rating
median - median rating
stddev - standard deviation of rating
owned - number of users who have a game
trading - number of users who selling a game
wishing - number of users who want to get a game
num_of_comments - number of comments
num_of_weights - number of scores for weight
average_weight - average weight of game
ranks - game ranks
main_publisher - main publisher
description - description of the game
publishers - all publishers
honors - all honors
expansions - all expansions
accessories - all accessories
artists - all artists
mechanics - used mechanics
category - category ща пфьуы
designers - all designers
graphic_designers - all graphic designers
subdomains - subdomains of categories
implementations - all implementations
suggested_numplayers - proposed number of players
podcast_episodes - all podcast episodes
comments - some comments
marketplace_history - marketplace history
thumbnail_link - thumbnail link
image_link - image link


**================**
**===== Ratings =====**
**================**

nickname - user's nickname
title - title of the game
boardgame_id - id of the board game
rating - given rating
num_of_plays - number of games played by the user
comment - comment fot rating
own - flag whether the user owns the game
prevowned - flag of whether the user has previously owned the game
fortrade - flag whether the user is selling the game
want - flag whether the user want the game
wanttoplay - flag whether the user want to play the game
wanttobuy - flag whether the user want to buy the game
wishlist - flag whether the user have the game in wishlist
preordered - flag whether the user preordered the game
last_modified - date of last modification
